tweet: Thur 8:50AM: Lake Cane's first visitor of the day - Damon from Golf Smith... even the competition knows we are the best place for tennis!!
Thur 8:30AM: Happy Thanksgiving from Lake Cane! The courts should be dry by 9:30 this AM. Lake Cane will be open until 4PM today.
Wed 5:20PM: Courts are still very wet. All evening programs are cancelled. Lake Cane Pro Shop will close at 7PM tonight. Happy Thanksgiving!
Wed 3:35PM: Rain has stopped, but courts are still very wet. 5PM Tournament Training classes are CANCELLED!!
